org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint

クラス DragPaintSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint.BasicPaintSession
      • org.eclipse.swt.examples.paint.DragPaintSession
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.MouseMoveListener, PaintSession, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener
    直系の既知のサブクラス:
    EllipseTool, LineTool, RectangleTool, RoundedRectangleTool

    public abstract class DragPaintSession
extends BasicPaintSession
    The superclass for paint tools that use click-drag-release motions to draw objects.
